root_title: Here's  My Shade To  Shadow Hunters /SMASh Contest -Round 297 [Eng - Spa]
body:

**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Hello Shadowhunter community. This weekend I went hunting and found a shadow that seemed interesting to me. I hope you share my appreciation in this regard.
If you have not yet started participating in this contest, I invite you to do so. You will soon discover that there is a lot of beauty hidden in those shadows that you didn't pay attention to before.
You can read the contest rules by clicking [here]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-f58255432b162 )

Hola, comunidad de cazadores de sombras. Este f√≠n de semana sal√≠ de cacer√≠a y encontr√© una sombra que me pareci√≥ interesante. Espero que compartan mi apreciaci√≥n al respecto.
Si a√∫n no has comenzado a participar en este concurso, te invito a que lo hagas. Pronto descubrir√°s que hay mucho de belleza oculto en esas sombras a las que antes no prestaba atenci√≥n.

author: luisfe
root_title: My Entry To Shadow Hunters /SMASh Contest -Round 297
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmYfrAJeE9raau6mxoSx9QuQU9x79z9SsiyhNx7jG8ddEe/20231123_082752.jpg



**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Hello community, when I saw this shadow I remembered the Disney movie Peter Pan in the part where the shadow escapes from Peter and Wendy has to sew it to his shoes.
I thought it was a very good shadow to share and participate in this round 297. If you want to participate, find out its rules by clicking [here](https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash- contest-round-f58255432b162 )

https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png


Versi√≥n en castellano

Hola, comunidad, cuando vi est√° sombra record√© la pel√≠cula Peter Pan de Disney en la parte donde la sombra escapa de Peter y Wendy tiene qu√© cos√©rsela a los zapatos.
Me pareci√≥ una muy buena sombra para compartir y participar en esta ronda 297. Si deseas participar, ent√©rate de sus bases haciendo clic [ac√°](https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-f58255432b162 )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png

###### Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga. > ###### Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you, ***

author: elioe
root_title: Hive Music Festival -üé∂ Week N¬∞58 - Round 1 [ENG-SPA] "Pastor Divino" ‚õ™ (Divine Sheperd) Cover By @elioe üéÑ
body:
---
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmZJzTmoWUTBa29isgAmGujWZz6hjk8uLev6qxNxsvTTWL/inshot_20231126_062330918.jpg)


**
(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)
**
Greetings, @musiczone community. Congratulations to each and everyone on the recent celebration - on November 22 - of Musician's Day. May Saint Cecilia, virgin and martyr, the Patroness of Musicians, help and accompany us in all our projects and ways.
The most beautiful time of the year is approaching: Christmas! Time to dust off the maracas and activate them, accompanying the songs in honor of the Child Jesus.
Today is the First Sunday of Advent, the joyous era of the arrival of the Child Jesus, our Divine Shepherd, whom it is our responsibility to follow, begins. Therefore, in the company of my friends from the Musical Group "Venezuelan Power" I present to you a Venezuelan Christmas Carol: "Pastor Divino" (Divine Sheperd) which begins with a call:
Follow His steps to the Divine Shepherd to the Divine Shepherd who follows His footsteps is on a good way who follows His footsteps is on the right way


This cheerful Venezuelan Christmas Carol was originally performed by the musical group "Un Solo Pueblo" (Only One People) with the lead voice of the charismatic singer Francisco Pacheco.

One of the verses we sing was written by @hermaryrc, it is the one that says:
This choir sings //with infinite force// //although our voices don't be brand new //


The friends who supported me in this participation:
@barbyjr Video recording @hermaryrc Leading voice @orlandobello Percussion @sayury Choirs, guitar, post publication
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafkreie2yw6f74fnfxrvltwdo4lvvnuzgvb7jkza2ipurr63ojg36p42lm/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=elioe/dkmhvfox) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=elioe/dkmhvfox)

https://images.ecency.com/DQmYSsDs1B3wsEQw4SGKmugpbGkHroMyPYQZJsraz1m2qAk/separad_or_elioe.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**

Saludos, comunidad de @musiczone. Felicitaciones a todos y cada uno por la reciente celebraci√≥n - el 22 de noviembre - del D√≠a del M√∫sico. Que Santa Cecilia, virgen y m√°rtir, la Patrona de los M√∫sicos, nos ayude y acompa√±e en todos nuestros proyectos y caminos.
Se acerca la √©poca m√°s bella del a√±o ¬°La Navidad! Tiempo de desempolvar las maracas y activadas acompa√±ando los cantos en honor al Ni√±o Dios.
Hoy es Primer Domingi de Adviento, comienza la alegre Eso era de la llegada del Ni√±o Jes√∫s, nuestro Pastor Divino, a quien nos corresponde seguir. Por eso, en compa√±√≠a de mis amigos de la Agrupaci√≥n Musical "Venezuelan Power" les presento un "aguinaldo de parranda": "Pastor Divino", el cual comienza con un llamado:
S√≠ganle los pasos al Pastor Divino al Pastor Divino quien sigue Sus pasos va por buen camino quien sigue quien sigue Sus pasos va por buen camino


Este alegre aguinaldo fue interpretado originalmente por la agrupaci√≥n musical "Un S√≥lo Pueblo" con la voz solista del carism√°tico Francisco Pacheco.
Si desean leer la letra de la canci√≥n, hagan clic [ac√°]( https://www.musica.com/letras.asp?letra=1911620 )

Una de las estrofas que cantamos la escribi√≥ @hermaryrc, se trata de la que dice:
Este coro canta //con fuerza infinita// //aunque nuestras voces no sean nuevecitas//

Los amigos que me brindaron su apoyo en esta participaci√≥n:
@barbyjr Grabaci√≥n del video @hermaryrc Voz l√≠der @orlandobello Percusi√≥n @sayury Coros, guitarra, publicaci√≥n del post
https://youtu.be/Hy_6UkGjf1c?si=byM7HPDAFXdCy550

Pueden ver la letra de la canci√≥n haciendo clic [ac√°]( https://www.musica.com/letras.asp?letra=1911620 )

https://images.ecency.com/DQmYSsDs1B3wsEQw4SGKmugpbGkHroMyPYQZJsraz1m2qAk/separad_or_elioe.png

I am very grateful to those who took their time to listen to me play the maracas and to those who had infinite patience to read this far. Gratitude to the organizers and wishes of success to all participants.
>Agradezco mucho a quienes apartaron de su tiempo para escucharme tocar las maracas y a quienes tuvieron paciencia infinita para llegar leyendo hasta ac√°. Gratitud hacia los organizadores y deseos de √©xito para todos los participantes.

author: sayury
root_title: Hive Music Festival -üé∂ Week N¬∞58 - Round 1 [ENG-SPA] "All My Loving" üíï (The Beatles) Cover By @sayury
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmTbUYEzZkpGNFhyGuKp9uZGYrcPeRodtpTcwJaTocxrJH/inshot_20231125_153152447.jpg


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Greetings my highly esteemed community of music lovers, I would venture to say "crazy about music." I wish that the beauty of music always brings joy to your hearts. In this 58th week we have the beginning of a new cycle of three rounds, this being the first and for me it is very special, since after several months without being able to meet - musically speaking, since we see each other and talk frequently but in a context different from the musical - I was able to meet with some of my friends - colleagues from "Venezuelan Power" and record my video with their support.
This week I bring to share with you another song from the past: "All My Loving" by that wonderful and unforgettable group: [The Beatles]( https://www.biography.com/musicians/how-the-beatles-formed ), the ones who produced "Beatlemania" internationally.
It is a sweet, romantic and nostalgic song that develops in the context of a farewell with the promise of someone who walks away from writing home daily. In the past, communications did not have the immediacy they have today. A farewell to someone who was going to another country was knowing that - depending on the intermediate distance, of course - perhaps the beloved and desired letter would reach your hands with the "fresh" news from... six months before. It was hard... It was strong. When you received the notification of the birth of a baby, it was because it was already six months old.
The other side of the coin: finding out long months after the death of a loved one considered alive until that moment.
To understand the sadness of this song you have to go back to the time in which it was written. Its lyrics carry a lot of feeling and its melody a lot of beauty.
In this video I had the pleasant collaboration of some of my friends and colleagues from the musical group "Venezuelan Power": @barbyjr Video recording @elioe Setting @hermaryrc Image consulting @orlandobello Percussion
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeig7ezgwlub7auqa5d474auezzetoh6bgkam6qap566xggdee3bdfm/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=sayury/crfekywt) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=sayury/crfekywt)

Lyrics All My Lovin The Beatles Close your eyes and I'll kiss you Tomorrow I'll miss you Remember I'll always be true And then while I'm away I'll write home everyday And I'll send all my loving to you I'll pretend that I'm kissing The lips I am missing And hope that my dreams will come true And then while I'm away I'll write home everyday And I'll send all my loving to you

[Fuente](https://www.letras.com/the-beatles/172/)
‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§‚ô©https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/a_separador_sayury.png‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§
Versi√≥n en castellano

>Saludos, mi muy estimada comunidad de amantes de la m√∫sica, yo me aventurar√≠a a decir de "locos por la m√∫sica". Deseo que la belleza de la m√∫sica traiga siemore alegr√≠a a sus corazones. >En esta semana 58 tenemos el inicio de un nuevo ciclo de tres rondas siendo esta la primera y pa m√≠ es muy especial, ya que despu√©s de varios meses sin poder reunirme - musicalmente hablando, ya que nos vemos y hablamos con frecuencia pero en un contexto distinto al musical - pude reunirme con parte de mis compa√±eros de "Venezuelan Power" y grabar mi video con su apoyo. >Esta semana traigo para compartir con ustedes otra canci√≥n del pasado : "All My Lovin' " de ese grupo maravilloso e inolvidable: [Los Beatles]( https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Beatles ) los que produjeron la "Beatlemania" a nivel internacional. >Es una canci√≥n dulce, rom√°ntica y nost√°lgica que se desarrolla en el contexto de una despedida con la promesa de quien se aleja de escribir a casa diariamente. >Antiguamente las comunicaciones no ten√≠an la inmediatez actual. Una despedida a alguien que se fuera a otro pa√≠s era saber que - dependiendo de la distancia intermedia, por supuesto - quiz√° la carta amada y deseada llegar√≠a a tus manos con las noticias "frescas" de... seis meses antes. Era duro... Era fuerte. Cuando te llegaba el aviso del nacimiento de un beb√© era porque ya ten√≠a seis meses de nacido.
>La otra cara de la moneda: enterarse largos meses despu√©s de la muerte de un ser querido tenido por vivo hasta ese momento.
>Para entender la tristeza de esta canci√≥n hay qu√© ubicarse en el tiempo en que fue escrita. Lleva mucho de sentimiento su letra y mucho de hermosura su melod√≠a.
>En este video cont√© con la grata colaboraci√≥n de algunos de mis amigos y compa√±eros de la agrupaci√≥n musical "Venezuelan Power": @barbyjr Grabaci√≥n del video @elioe Ambientaci√≥n @hermaryrc Asesor√≠a de imagen @orlandobello Percusi√≥n
https://youtu.be/TSpiwK5fig0?si=SQjfb-MFwwC6L-xO

Letra Todo mi amor Los Beatles Cierra los ojos y te besar√© Ma√±ana te extra√±are Recuerda que siempre te ser√© fiel Y luego mientras estoy fuera Escribir√© a casa todos los d√≠as Y te enviar√© todo mi amor fingir√© que estoy besando Los labios que me faltan Y espero que mis sue√±os se hagan realidad Y luego mientras estoy fuera Escribir√© a casa todos los d√≠as Y te enviar√© todo mi amor


‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§‚ô©https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/a_separador_sayury.png‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§


Thank you for watching the video until the end and reading this far. >Gracias por ver el video hasta el final y llegar leyendo hasta ac√°.

author: orlandobello
root_title: Hive Music Festival Week 58 Round 1 "Un Gato En La Oscuridad" Cover By @orlandobello And His Drums
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmbLebycQUnYXfpcu2rwtEGiZ5TbM6FX5Lc56XgQ2hojJH/inshot_20231125_053135030.jpg

[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeibwsu2wgzmeyqfxdn5zzsqfw4kkqmda7gx2hop2sdhtnajeasozxm/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=orlandobello/tnhgcgzp) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=orlandobello/tnhgcgzp)
--- (Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe. La versi√≥n en castellano est√° al final del post)
Greetings, community of musicians and music lovers This is my third participation in this magnificent Festival, after a long season without being able to publish due to fortuitous circumstances. I am happy to return and I appreciate the support that my friends from "Venezuelan Power" (Name devised by @fernanblog) gave me for the making of this video: @barbyjr Recording @elioe Setting @hermaryrc Lighting and choirs @sayury Guitar, lead vocals, post publication I participate as a percussionist. My team is a Christmas drum, a cymbal and - above all - great desire to make music. My passion and my joy! For this, my third meeting with you, I selected the song "Un Gato En La Oscuridad" (A Cat In The Darkness) a song that was popularized several decades ago by the Brazilian vocalist Roberto Carlos. It is a song that is among my favorites for its rhythm, its beautiful melody and its romantic and poetic lyrics. In one of the photos that accompany this publication you will see a tabby cat. It's "Catire", @barbyjr's pet.
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmbY47AD6Aj8cLLGvAAcfCWwJG8dHhUY4EyMggrDSMi33Q/inshot_20231125_055300678.jpg)

"Catire" (Blonde) is a kitten who is not like the one in the song "sad and blue" but proud and with its white and yellow stripes it walks around our house looking at us with an air of superiority and sometimes with disgust when instead of buying the imported catfood- which fascinates it - it finds economical catfood on its plate - which it leaves on the plate -. I hope that my rhythmic interpretation of this beautiful song with the support of my friends be to your liking.
![325339110_1207845740143882_3394016779554725869_n.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/orlandobello/23vsWm258JVn4ELTVb13LVo42nws8TEyQtbJEc2eHpTShp4QMWV7byQw1CinuWhMwkrhk.png)


Versi√≥n en castellano


>Saludos, comunidad de m√∫sicos y amantes de la musica >Esta es mi primera participaci√≥n en este magn√≠fico Festival, luego de una larga temporada sin poder publicar debido a circunstancias fortuitas. Estoy feliz de regresar y agradezco el apoyo que me dieron mis amigos de "Venezuelan Power" (Nombre ideado por @fernanblog) para la realizaci√≥n de este video: >@barbyjr Grabaci√≥n @elioe Ambientaci√≥n @hermaryrc Iluminaci√≥n y coros @sayury Guitarra, voz principal, publicaci√≥n del post --- >Participo como percusionista. Mi equipo es un tambor de parranda navide√±a, un platillo y - sobre todo - grandes deseos de hacer m√∫sica ¬°Mi pasi√≥n y mi alegr√≠a! >Para este, mi tercer encuentro con ustedes, seleccion√© el tema "Un Gato En La Oscuridad", canci√≥n que fuera popularizada hace varias d√©cadas por el vocalista brasile√±o Roberto Carlos. Es una canci√≥n que se cuenta entre mis favoritas por su r√≠tmica, su bella melod√≠a y su rom√°ntica y po√©tica letra. >Les brindo cono un obsequio la interpretaci√≥n original en la voz de Roberto Carlos, a la vez les invito a escuchar otros temas de √©l, ya que cada una de sus canciones tiene una magia especial.
https://youtu.be/jEfJy5rQ-uA?si=Pn-XxA_fysm15KoI

>En una de las fotos que acompa√±an est√° publicaci√≥n ver√°n un gato atigrado. Es "Catire", la mascota de @barbyjr.
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmbY47AD6Aj8cLLGvAAcfCWwJG8dHhUY4EyMggrDSMi33Q/inshot_20231125_055300678.jpg)

>Catire es un minino que se las trae, no es como el de la canci√≥n "triste y azul" sino orgulloso y con sus rayas blancas y amarillas se pasea por la casa mir√°ndonos con aire de superioridad y a veces con disgusto cuando en lugar de comprarle la gatarina importada - que le fascina - encuentra en su platito gatarina econ√≥mica - que en el plato la deja -. >Espero que mi interpretaci√≥n r√≠tmica de esta hermosa canci√≥n con el apoyo de mus amigos sea de su agrado.
![325339110_1207845740143882_3394016779554725869_n.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/orlandobello/23vsWm258JVn4ELTVb13LVo42nws8TEyQtbJEc2eHpTShp4QMWV7byQw1CinuWhMwkrhk.png)

All photos and video are my own, captured with LGK42 phone.

author: luisfe
root_title: IN VENEZUELA YOU COOK ON BRICKS /EN VENEZUELA SE COCINA SOBRE LADRILLOS
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmcVazqdoTQfm1kMukJvk38voSfhqKF95PX1dviP8iwsNa/20231123_073612.jpg

(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe. Al final del post se encuentra la versi√≥n en castellano)

Yes, bricks in Venezuela are still used for construction, but lately they have acquired a new utility, because of what Plato, the Greek philosopher, described as [‚ÄúThe true creator is necessity, which is the mother of our invention.‚Äù ](https://www.vedantu.com/english/necessity-is-the-mother-of-invention-essay#:~:text=The%20concept%20of%20necessity%20being,and%20innovative%20solutions%20for%20it.)
It turns out that now the traditional kitchen has been partially replaced by the home-made or brick kitchen.
Previously, gas distribution companies for domestic use were private. When a person ran out of gas, they called the company. The next day the gas truck arrived. A company worker uninstalled the empty cylinder and replaced it with a full one.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmd33js7RAZbsPD1YxiTfDCLiwcbgsxY8NNgdvfMdYe4Pa/20231123_073614.jpg
Now the company is managed by the state. You have to hand the cylinder to the person in charge, pay immediately and wait one to three months (sometimes more) for the full one to be delivered. The other option: buy it "under the table" from individuals. The smallest bottle is currently "trading" - yes, like the stock on the Stock Market - at $7. With a basic monthly salary of $5... You can imagine... That's why gas can be saved to the extreme by cooking with electricity, but since electric stoves are out of reach of almost all budgets, you acquire the resistance that they sell. as a spare and the kitchen is "assembled" inside a brick.
The brick kitchen cannot completely replace the traditional one due to long power outages. They work together, as a team, sharing space in humble kitchens and also in less humble ones. Fast-cooking things are prepared on the gas stove and slower ones - for example, softening beans - on the brick stove. To save gas!

In order to survive here, those of us who have not left have had to invent new ways to do things with fewer and fewer resources, but... we continue inventing and we continue surviving.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmetJ1EF9cLAPWN5RDh36gAwP4VpW9Sn5qAgbsZjU5Eofs/20231123_073618.jpg


https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png

"Earn some small money by doing advertising and follow @advertisingbot2"
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png


Versi√≥n en castellano


https://images.ecency.com/DQmetJ1EF9cLAPWN5RDh36gAwP4VpW9Sn5qAgbsZjU5Eofs/20231123_073618.jpg


S√≠, a√∫n los ladrillos en Venezuela se utilizan para la construcci√≥n, pero √∫ltimamente han adquirido una nueva utilidad, por aquello que describiera Plat√≥n, el fil√≥sofo griego, como [ ‚ÄúEl verdadero creador es la necesidad, que es la madre de nuestra invenci√≥n‚Äù.]( https://forwardteacher.com/2017/10/la-necesidad-es-la-madre-de-la-invencion/#:~:text=Para%20guiarlo%2C%20hice%20referencia%20a,retos%20que%20enfrenta%20Puerto%20Rico. ) Resulta que ahora la cocina tradicional ha sido sustituida parcialmente por la cocina de fabricacion casera o de ladrillo. Antes las compa√±√≠as distribuidoras del gas para uso dom√©stico eran privadas. Cuando a una persona se le terminaba el gas telefoneaba a la compa√±√≠a. Al d√≠a siguiente llegaba el cami√≥n del gas. Un obrero de la compa√±√≠a desinstalaba la bombona vac√≠a y la sustitu√≠a por una llena. Ahora la empresa la administra el estado. Hay qu√© entregar la bombona al encargado de ello, pagar de inmediato y esperar de uno a tres meses (a veces m√°s) para que le entreguen la llena. La otra opci√≥n: comprarla "por debajo de cuerda" a particulares. La bombona m√°s peque√±a actualmente "se cotiza actualmente" - s√≠, como las acciones de la Bolsa de Valores - en 7$. Con un salario b√°sico mensual de 5$... Se podr√°n imaginar...Por eso el gas se ahorrar al extremo cocinando con electricidad, pero como las cocinas el√©ctricas quedan fuera del alcance de casi todos los bolsillos, se adquiere la resistencia que venden como repuesto y la cocina "se arma" dentro de un ladrillo.
La cocina de ladrillo no puede sustituir totalmente a la tradicional debido a los largos apagones.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmcVazqdoTQfm1kMukJvk38voSfhqKF95PX1dviP8iwsNa/20231123_073612.jpg

Trabajan en conjunto, en equipo, compartiendo espacio en las cocinas humildes y tambi√©n en las menos humildes. Las cosas de r√°pida cocci√≥n se preparan en la cocina a gas y las m√°s lentas - por ejemplo, abland√†r las caraotas, en la cocina de ladrillo ¬°Para ahorrar gas!
Para lograr sobrevivir ac√°, los que no nos hemos ido, ha tocado ir inventando nuevas formas de lograr hacer las cosas cada vez con menos recursos, pero... seguimos inventando y seguimos sobreviviendo.

"Gana algo de dinero haciendo publicidad y sigue a @advertisingbot2"
https://images.ecency.com/DQmd33js7RAZbsPD1YxiTfDCLiwcbgsxY8NNgdvfMdYe4Pa/20231123_073614.jpg

###### Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga. > ###### Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you, *** ###
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked my photography work and leave with the intention of returning..

Si lo deseas, puedes seguirme en las redes If you wish you may follow me in the web

‚ñ∂Ô∏è [3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=luisfe/nndzeydk)

author: advertisingbot2
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising contest for week 47 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2023-11-24 to 2023-11-30.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![Task_and_Rules.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKe5wHrNamDx6RNtvzvqhB4qwg2qhZTGoEtwSPhfsuwSEJhTjSajgbDFC77j8pa.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Earn some small money by doing advertising and follow @advertisingbot2"**

![optional.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKtSxwA38nJdyUdmvhncNmy6tW8CtYvXAw982Fh8BvMuxYgstc1eESWrwkNtsYn.png)

> The account @advertisingbot2 creates regular contests. Every person with a Hive account can join by writing a post with advertising text included. The users usually get 2 Hive for these actions.
Sponsors can create these advertising contests by just filling out a form and sending the budget to @advertisingbot2. The rest of the budget will be sent back to the sponsor. 
This advertisingprocess works, but is still at the beginning (betaphase).


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2 Hive each.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaing-23111701
https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001
https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-advertising-contest-from-last-week


![About.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AK299d4UG9ZMVqmPCk4bNmimT7nsX7e97oF5X92S4LFjZbapekr19HWa8BGonQF.png)

# Status of this project

This week I worked on the automatic creation of a campaing, based on a template. I only need to change the following parameters: 
```
const budget = 20 // Hive
const reward = 2 // Hive per participant
const maxAdvertisers = budget/reward
const advertisingText = 'follow @fjworld and visit https://epaytraffic.com/'
const sponsor = '@achimmertens';
```

With this, the campaign-Text is created automatically.

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
